org.smartfrog.services.dns
Class DNSRecordImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.services.dns.DNSRecordImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DNSRecord
public abstract class DNSRecordImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DNSRecord

An abstract class that implements a DNS record to be updated.

reverseAddress

public static java.lang.String reverseAddress(org.xbill.DNS.Name addressZone,
                                              java.net.InetAddress addr)
Reverses an IP address and returns a string that concatenates the address to a zone name eliminating redundant subnets already specified in the zone name.

Parameters:
addressZone - A zone name for reverse look-ups of that IP address.
addr - An IP address to be reversed and partially added to the zone name.
Returns:
A string that concatenates the address to a zone name eliminating redundant subnets already specified in the zone name.
